text: Barcelonnette is a commune of France. It is a subprefecture in the department of Alpes-de-Haute-Provence, in the Provence-Alpes-CÃ´te d'Azur region. It is in the southern French Alps. == References == Category:Communes in Alpes-de- Haute-Provence Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Barcelonnette
